text:
Although the incident was resolved,
the scars of the damage still remained
at the ceremony hall of Archimedes Colony.

Rapid restoration work was being carried out,
primarily by the heroes themselves,
and the solemn atmosphere was gradually being restored.

Having finished the day's work and disbanded,
[Player] was called over by a certain person.

options.text: I probably can't go too far.
Somewhere to kill time, let's see...

text:
The boulevard, full of smiles and vitality.
[Player] looked around again. Then, there was—

There was Gaisei,
wrapping himself in an aura so tragic,
it cut him off from his surroundings.

name: Gaisei
text:
Ah, [Player].
What a coincidence, but please, command a battle immediately.
This unworthy one has just found a suitable opponent...

Gaisei, seeing [Player] in his sight,
immediately smiled and walked straight up to them.
And then...

name: Gaisei
text: ...Ah, it seems I've reached my limit.

He then lost his balance and leaned on [Player],
embracing them, muttering his words weakly.

name: Gaisei
text: ...I'm hungry.

options.text: G-Gaisei!? Get a hold of yourself!

name: Gaisei
text:
...You saved me.
I thank you, [Player].

Supported by [Player], he staggered along,
finally reaching a park that caught his eye—

After devouring a large amount of food
he'd bought from a nearby food stall,
Gaisei finally regained his composure.

options.text: No, it's no big deal, but...
How did you end up in that situation?
What kind of favor should I ask for in return?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gaisei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I have no intention of leaving the debt unpaid.
Anything this unworthy one can do, please feel free to use this body as you wish.

name: Gaisei
text:
So, why was I there, you ask?
It's a trivial reason, not worth speaking of—

name: Gaisei
text:
No, if I recall your words correctly,
conversation also leads to strength, doesn't it?

As if remembering the incident with the pillar of light,
Gaisei slowly opened his mouth, looking into [Player]'s eyes.

name: Gaisei
text:
This unworthy one no longer has a reason to stay on the moon.
I was supposed to return with the Observer, but...
it seems there's still some research left.

name: Gaisei
text:
I was told to wait without battling anyone.
It's unpleasant, but to secure our return trip,
I had no choice but to—

name: Gaisei
text:
I was waiting, but then I realized I had no money on me.
So I was walking around, wondering what to do.

options.text: So you walked around until you were in that state!?

name: Gaisei
text:
...!!
I see, that's an option I hadn't thought of.

name: Gaisei
text:
I rarely contacted anyone,
so it didn't occur to me at all.

name: Gaisei
text:
...To converse.
This is probably where one should start, I suppose.

Having said that, Gaisei quietly lowered his face
and gazed intently at his own hands.

name: Gaisei
text:
This unworthy one is unskilled with words.
In the first place, I do not feel
the necessity of accomplishing anything using words.

name: Gaisei
text:
Once, the director of the orphanage
where this unworthy one grew up repeatedly said:
"Be strong and kind."

name: Gaisei
text:
The director I knew always approached any opponent with dialogue first.
...He said it was best if power didn't need to be shown.

Gaisei clenched his gazed-upon hands tightly,
and strong emotions surfaced on his face.

name: Gaisei
text:
However, dialogue almost never went well
on this unworthy one's planet.

name: Gaisei
text:
—Negotiation, reconciliation, promises.
Such things that use words
collapse easily before overwhelming power!

name: Gaisei
text:
Therefore, this unworthy one seeks power.
Until my power surpasses all others, and I can demonstrate that power,
to me, that is the supreme value.

name: Gaisei
text:
...Yet, [Player],
you effortlessly shattered this unworthy one's premise.

name: Gaisei
text:
For this unworthy one,
it's like a bolt from the blue.
To gain further power—

name: Gaisei
text:
I must use words, which I am not good at...
and even master something as fragile as relationships.

name: Gaisei
text:
My gratitude. [Player].
This unworthy one shall aim for even
greater heights and refine my own power.

Having said that,
Gaisei held [Player]'s hand and smiled broadly,
just like if they were on a battlefield.

name: Gaisei
text:
Instruct me, [Player].
What should this unworthy one do,
and how does one train a relationship?

Still holding hands tightly,
Gaisei shuffled closer to [Player].

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gaisei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Understood.
However, this unworthy one is not very patient.
Please tell me in detail here.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gaisei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Understood.
However, this unworthy one is not very patient.
Please tell me in detail here.

options.text: Um, first, get to know the other person...

name: Gaisei
text:
First, get to know the other person, you say.
I believe I have already said that about this unworthy one.

name: Gaisei
text:
...Then that's not enough.
However, there isn't much this unworthy one can say.

name: Gaisei
text:
Since leaving the planet where my orphanage was,
refining my power has been this unworthy one's everything.

name: Gaisei
text:
Battle, training, and then battle once more...
For this unworthy one's life, everything else is trivial.

options.text: What do you do besides battling and training?

name: Gaisei
text:
Battle and training, and time outside of that, you ask?
...I don't do anything in particular.

name: Gaisei
text:
For this unworthy one, it is meaningless time;
it passes without me realizing it.

Gaisei spoke about himself in bits and pieces.
His face gradually clouded over, changing into one of displeasure.

name: Gaisei
text:
[Player], does this truly lead to strength?
This unworthy one is bored.

name: Gaisei
text:
As I said earlier,
this unworthy one is not good with words.
Is there no other method?

name: Gaisei
text:
I see, physical contact.
...In that case, I have some recollection.
Indeed, the orphanage director used to do this...
Saying that, Gaisei gently, quietly clasped [Player]'s hand.

name: Gaisei
text:
...This unworthy one cannot feel much of a difference.
Other than that, indeed...

Pulling the clasped hand closer,
Gaisei gently embraced [Player].

name: Gaisei
text:
Is this a new method
of training relationships?

name: Gaisei
text:
This is... good.
It's an unknown sensation,
different from the exhilaration of battle.

name: Gaisei
text:
As expected of [Player].
You always show me precise answers to my desires.

name: Gaisei
text:
If I continue this,
my power will reach even greater heights.
[Player], please transform once...

Gaisei, who had been
embracing [Player], loosened his grip.
The distance between them widened—

Pulling his hand away,
Gaisei embraced [Player] even more strongly than before.

name: Gaisei
text:
I see.
It's a method to strengthen relationships by separating,
and then re-establishing physical contact.

name: Gaisei
text:
What does this mean, [Player]?
The moment I separated from you—

name: Gaisei
text:
An unbearable discomfort ran through this unworthy one's body.
...This unworthy one does not know this sensation.

name: Gaisei
text:
However, the moment I touched you
again like this, that discomfort vanished.
I don't know the cause, but—

name: Gaisei
text:
Please allow me to stay like this for a while longer.
...Even though it's not a battle, I can feel
a sense of exhilaration as if I'm receiving your command.

name: Gaisei
text:
I just want to engrave this excitement,
this joy that's different from battle, into my body.

Two shadows overlapped in the park enveloped in darkness.
The Earth, floating overhead, gently illuminated those shadows.
